tagline.title: ENJOY THE SCENIC VIEW OF GATE OF HEAVEN IN LEMPUYANG TEMPLE, TIRTA GANGGA WATER PALACE AND SWING WITH VIEW RICE TERRACE
tagline.text: ENJOY THE SCENIC VIEW OF GATE OF HEAVEN IN LEMPUYANG TEMPLE, TIRTA GANGGA WATER PALACE AND SWING WITH VIEW RICE TERRACE
tagline.html: ENJOY THE SCENIC VIEW OF GATE OF HEAVEN IN LEMPUYANG TEMPLE, TIRTA GANGGA WATER PALACE AND SWING WITH VIEW RICE TERRACE

description.text: Bali Instagram Tour is a Bali Full Day Tour Packages to travel to a very instagrammable spot on the island of Bali, where we will head to Lempuyang Temple to visit this temple and take photos at the Gate of Heaven with the background of Mount Agung, where Mount Agung is the largest mountain on the island of Bali, and continue heading to Tirta Gangga Water Palace, this place used to be a bathing pool devoted to the King of Karangasem and his family, and now it is made as a very instagramable tourist attraction, where you can take pictures on the footing in the pond surrounded by koi fish which are very large, as for the photos produced are very instagrammable, we are sure you will get a lot of likes if you upload them on instagram, after that proceed to a restaurant to enjoy lunch with Indonesian food, after lunch the journey continues to Aloha swing to do Swing activities with the background of the Tegalalang the famous rice terrace, besides swing there are many activities to take pictures where the photos are very instagrammable. Enjoy all the activities on this Aloha swing, we are sure that it will complete your vacation time on the island of Bali, after the Aloha swing we will take you back to where you stay with very impressive memories in this Bali Instagram Tour.

Enjoy all the activities on this Aloha swing, we are sure that it will complete your vacation time on the island of Bali, after the Aloha swing we will take you back to where you stay with very impressive memories in this Bali Instagram Tour.

price.title: Bali Instagram Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Instagram Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,500,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 975,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 5 Person or more : IDR 875,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

inclusion:
Bali Instagram Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Entrance Fee
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Shuttle Bus to Lempuyang Temple
  • Ticket spot photo fee at Lempuyang Temple
  • Aloha Swing Packages : 4 Type Swing (Single, Tandem, Libra, Romantic), Bird Nest, Chicken nest
  • Insurance Coverage during Swing
  • Mineral Water (1 bottle/person)

Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
